pkgmetadata.longdescription: # xmlmergeXMLMerge is simple tool to merge multiple xml files.## How to Install```bashpip install xmlmerge```## Usage```bash$xmlmerge file1.xml file2.xml > file3.xml$xmlmerge tests/*.xml > combine.xml```## How end file looks like```xml 1234 1234 1234 1234 ```## ContactContact Kiran Kumar Kotari with any suggestions or comments. If you find any bugs please fix them and send me a pull request.
